name: Dice Hero
description:
How to play:

Move - Arrow keys or WASD

Roll dice in combat/ Select upgrade - Space bar

Dice Hero is a relaxing roguelike game, just combat with your dice!! Each time you defeat an enemy, you can upgrade your dice or your stats

THE DOOR ONLY OPENS AFTER YOU DEFEATED ALL THE ENEMIES

Choose your upgrades wisely, build a powerful hero and slay the final boss!!
